sentences.english: Islander points to inhabitant of an island.
sentences.chinese: 岛民是指岛屿上的居民。

sentences.english: Risk was lowest in Asians and Pacific Islanders.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲和太平洋的岛民患肥胖的风险很低。

sentences.english: When the Sentinelese islanders didn't want help after the 2004 tsunami, it was perfectly understandable.
sentences.chinese: 森提奈岛民拒绝外界援助的举动我们完全可以理解。

sentences.english: Islanders buried the man in the island’s Old European Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 岛民把它埋在过去欧洲人的公墓。

sentences.english: Being an islander, it is our duty to protect our ocean culture.
sentences.chinese: 身为岛民，我们有责任保护我们的海洋文化。

sentences.english: Many islanders resent the pace of economic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 许多岛民对此地的经济改良很生气。

sentences.english: Islanders are now debating what to call the new piece of land
sentences.chinese: 岛民正在争论该给新出现的这片小岛起个什么名字。

sentences.english: Most islanders engage in subsistence activities ranging from fishing to the growing of food crops.
sentences.chinese: 多数岛民参与从钓鱼到食用农作物的生产活动中。

sentences.english: Where can I watch Islander movie online free full stream?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪里可以在线免费观看电影岛民全部流？

sentences.english: Pacific Islanders had used similar 15)hand-spears for millennia.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋岛民千百年来一直延用着这样持矛捕鱼的方式。

sentences.english: Or perhaps the islanders grew so used to the work that they just couldn't stop themselves.
sentences.chinese: 或者，岛民对修建工作习以为常，无法停止下来。

sentences.english: That used to be the staple crop of the islanders.
sentences.chinese: 那以前是岛民的主要作物。

definition: Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Republic of Palau or Belau (Pacific island nation)
Maori, indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand
